### 2. favorite tracks - audio features
```{r source, warning = TRUE, results = FALSE, message = FALSE}

   library (tidyverse)
   library (ggrepel)

   favorite_tracks <-
     ceiling(get_my_saved_tracks(include_meta_info = TRUE)[['total']] / 50) %>%
     seq() %>%
     map(function(x) {
       get_my_saved_tracks(
          limit = 50, offset = (x - 1) * 50)
         }) %>% 
     reduce (rbind) %>%
     unnest (track.artists)
   
   favorite_tracks_unique <- favorite_tracks %>%
      distinct (track.id) %>%
      pull (track.id)
   
   favorite_tracks_features <-get_track_audio_features (favorite_tracks_unique) %>%
      right_join(favorite_tracks, by = c("id" = "track.id")) %>%
      rename (
         artist.name = name,
         popularity = track.popularity
         ) %>%
      mutate (
         duration_min = duration_ms / 1000 / 60,
         country = str_extract(track.external_ids.isrc, "^.{2}"),
         country = recode (country, "QM" = "US", "QZ" = "US")
         ) %>%
      select (artist.name, track.name, danceability, energy, valence, tempo, popularity, duration_min, country) %>%
      distinct (track.name, .keep_all = T)
   
   ggplot (favorite_tracks_features, aes (x = valence, y = tempo, label = track.name)) +
      geom_point () +
      geom_label_repel(
         data = favorite_tracks_features %>% 
            filter (
               tempo > 175 |
               tempo < 85 |
               valence > .90 |
               valence < .25
               ),
         size = 2
         ) +
      scale_color_viridis_d() 
```


### 3.  favorite tracks - artist count
```{r}

   library (tidyverse)

   favorite_tracks <-
     ceiling(get_my_saved_tracks(include_meta_info = TRUE)[['total']] / 50) %>%
     seq() %>%
     map(function(x) {
       get_my_saved_tracks(
          limit = 50, offset = (x - 1) * 50)
         }) %>% 
     reduce(rbind)
   
   favorite_artists <- favorite_tracks %>%
     select (track.artists) %>%
     reduce (rbind) %>%
     reduce (rbind) %>%
     select (id, name)
   
   favorite_artists %>%
      count(id, sort = TRUE) %>%
      left_join(favorite_artists, by = 'id',.) %>%
      unique() %>%
      select(-id) %>%
      arrange (-n)
```


### 3. Recently played - audio features
```{r transform, message = F, results = F, warning = F}

   library (lubridate)

   recent_raw <- get_my_recently_played(limit = 50) %>% 
      clean_names()
   
   recent <- recent_raw %>%
      mutate(
         artist_name = map_chr(track_artists, function(x) x$name[1]),
         played_at = as_datetime(played_at),
         played_at = with_tz(played_at, tzone = "America/Chicago"),
         release = year(as_datetime(track_album_release_date))
         ) %>% 
      rename (
         album_name = track_album_name
         ) %>%
      select (track_id, artist_name, track_name, release, played_at) %>%
      distinct (track_id, .keep_all = T) 

   recent_tracks <- recent %>%
      select (track_id) %>%
      pull (track_id)
   
   recent_audio_features <- get_track_audio_features (recent_tracks) %>%
      left_join(recent, by = c("id" = "track_id")) %>%
      select (artist_name: release, danceability:tempo)
```


### 4.  Top all-time songs
```{r}

   library (kableExtra)

   get_my_top_artists_or_tracks(type = 'tracks', time_range = 'long_term', limit = 50) %>% 
       mutate(artist.name = map_chr(artists, function(x) x$name[1])) %>% 
       select(name, artist.name, album.name) %>%
       kable () %>%
       kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", full_width = F, position = "left")
```
